entities.name: fred
entities.description: The person who ordered the butterbeers and handed them out to the group.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A member of the group who is watching Fred hand out the beers and seems concerned about what's happening.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A member of the group who Harry suspects might have been telling people something that led to this gathering.

relationships.description: Fred ordered butterbeers from the barman, and Harry received one of them.
Harry suspects that Hermione might have been involved in telling people something that led to this gathering, which Fred is now handling.
